page.title: 16OLD PEOPLE'S HOME
page.content: This home is situated at {Silverhill}on the outskirts of Enniskillen and is run by{The Western {Health and Social Services Board}.It was at one time a farm house but forty years ago it was bought from the farmers and changed into an Old Peoples Home.There were at one stage two buildings but now because of a new covered walkway the buildings now join to each other.The Home can accomodate 38 people,many of whom will share a room with 1 or 2 other persons.Two beds are kept free for emergencies or for arranged visits.Some of the people who are in the home have no families and only receive visits from friends.The Home employs 26 people including a part time handi man. The age range of people in the home is{64_90.}The atmosphere in the home is very friendly.
